trans-unit.source: Where SELECTIVE mode is selected for a virtual host, the activation of privileges must be deferred until after the mapping phase of request processing has determined what <Directory> context applies to the request. This might give an attacker opportunities to introduce code through a RewriteMap running at top-level or <VirtualHost> context before privileges have been dropped and userid/gid set.
trans-unit.target: 其中被选择用于虚拟主机SELECTIVE模式，权限的激活必须推迟到以后请求处理的映射阶段已经确定什么 <Directory> 上下文适用于该请求。这可能使攻击者有机会通过在特权或用户ID / gid设置之前在顶级或 <VirtualHost> 上下文中运行的 RewriteMap 引入代码。

trans-unit.source: Where a key is set to the empty string, that key will be removed from the session.
trans-unit.target: 当一个键被设置为空字符串时,该键将从会话中删除。

trans-unit.target: 而点击工人,则会显示这个页面。

trans-unit.target: 该请求是否通过HTTPS完成。

trans-unit.source: Whether or not you have preloaded an ISAPI extension, all ISAPI extensions are governed by the same permissions and restrictions as CGI scripts. That is, OptionsExecCGI must be set for the directory that contains the ISAPI .dll file.
trans-unit.target: 不管您是否已预加载ISAPI扩展，所有ISAPI扩展都受与CGI脚本相同的权限和限制。即，必须为包含ISAPI .dll文件的目录设置 Options ExecCGI 。

trans-unit.target: 这项请求是否需要某种授权;

trans-unit.source: Whether this request is the initial request or a sub-request
trans-unit.target: 这个请求是初始请求还是子请求?

trans-unit.target: 是否允许非SNI客户端访问基于名称的虚拟主机。

trans-unit.source: Whether to apply the inherited Substitute patterns first (on), or after the ones of the current context (off). SubstituteInheritBefore is itself inherited, hence contexts that inherit it (those that don't specify their own SubstituteInheritBefore value) will apply the closest defined merge order.
trans-unit.target: 是先（ on ）还是在当前上下文中的on（ off ）之后应用继承的 Substitute 模式。 SubstituteInheritBefore 本身是继承的，因此继承它的上下文（未指定自己的 SubstituteInheritBefore 值的上下文）将应用最接近的定义合并顺序。

trans-unit.target: 是否检查远程服务器证书的CN字段。

trans-unit.target: 是否使用持久性连接

trans-unit.source: Whether wildcards in requested filenames are escaped when sent to the FTP server
trans-unit.target: 当发送至FTP服务器时,是否对请求的文件名中的通配符进行转义。

trans-unit.source: Whether wildcards in requested filenames trigger a file listing
trans-unit.target: 要求的文件名中的通配符是否会触发文件列表。

trans-unit.source: Which port does HTTPS use?
trans-unit.target: HTTPS使用哪个端口?

trans-unit.source: While mod_mime associates metadata with filename extensions, the core server provides directives that are used to associate all the files in a given container (e.g., <Location>, <Directory>, or <Files>) with particular metadata. These directives include ForceType, SetHandler, SetInputFilter, and SetOutputFilter. The core directives override any filename extension mappings defined in mod_mime.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 mod_mime 与文件扩展名相关联的元数据，该 core 服务器提供了用于所有文件在给定容器（关联指令例如， <Location> ， <Directory> 或 <Files> ）与特定的元数据。这些指令包括 ForceType ， SetHandler ， SetInputFilter 和 SetOutputFilter 。核心指令会覆盖 mod_mime 中定义的任何文件名扩展名映射。

trans-unit.source: While mod_so still loads modules with ApacheModuleFoo.dll names, the new naming convention is preferred; if you are converting your loadable module for 2.0, please fix the name to this 2.0 convention.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 mod_so 与仍然加载模块 ApacheModuleFoo.dll 名称，新的命名规则优先;如果您要将可加载模块转换为2.0，请将该名称更正为该2.0约定。

trans-unit.source: While TCP adjust its flow-control and window sizes, longer TLS records can get stuck in queues or get lost and need retransmission. This is of course true for all packets. TLS however needs the whole record in order to decrypt it. Any missing bytes at the end will stall usage of the received ones.
trans-unit.target: 当TCP调整其流控和窗口大小时,较长的TLS记录可能会卡在队列中或丢失,需要重传。当然,这对所有的数据包都是如此。然而TLS需要整个记录才能解密。任何在最后缺少的字节都会使收到的记录停止使用。

trans-unit.source: While filenames are generally case-insensitive on Windows, URLs are still treated internally as case-sensitive before they are mapped to the filesystem. For example, the <Location>, Alias, and ProxyPass directives all use case-sensitive arguments. For this reason, it is particularly important to use the <Directory> directive when attempting to limit access to content in the filesystem, since this directive applies to any content in a directory, regardless of how it is accessed. If you wish to assure that only lowercase is used in URLs, you can use something like:
trans-unit.target: 尽管在Windows上文件名通常不区分大小写，但在将URL映射到文件系统之前，仍在内部将它们视为区分大小写。例如， <Location> ， Alias 和 ProxyPass 指令均使用区分大小写的参数。因此，在尝试限制对文件系统中内容的访问时，使用 <Directory> 指令尤为重要，因为此指令适用于目录中的任何内容，无论如何访问。如果您希望确保URL中仅使用小写字母，则可以使用以下方法：

trans-unit.source: While many distributions make Apache httpd available as operating system supported packages, it can sometimes be desirable to install and use the canonical version of Apache httpd on these systems, replacing the natively provided versions of the packages.
trans-unit.target: 虽然许多发行版都将Apache httpd作为操作系统支持的软件包提供,但有时在这些系统上安装并使用Apache httpd的标准版本,以取代本地提供的软件包版本,也是可取的。

trans-unit.source: While processing a request, the server looks for the first existing configuration file from this list of names in every directory of the path to the document, if distributed configuration files are enabled for that directory. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在处理请求时，如果为该目录启用了分布式配置文件，则服务器将从该名称列表中的文档的路径的每个目录中查找第一个现有配置文件。例如：

trans-unit.source: While sending the response to the client, it might happen that the TCP write buffer fills up because the connection is too slow. Usually in this case a write() to the socket returns EWOULDBLOCK or EAGAIN, to become writable again after an idle time. The worker holding the socket might be able to offload the waiting task to the listener thread, that in turn will re-assign it to the first idle worker thread available once an event will be raised for the socket (for example, "the socket is now writable"). Please check the Limitations section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在将响应发送到客户端时，由于连接速度太慢，TCP写缓冲区可能已满。通常，在这种情况下，对套接字的 write() 返回 EWOULDBLOCK 或 EAGAIN ，以在空闲时间之后再次变为可写状态。持有套接字的工作程序可能能够将等待的任务卸载到侦听器线程，从而一旦套接字发生事件（例如，“套接字已现在可写”）。请检查“限制”部分以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: While set to on, asynchronous support for ISAPI callbacks is simulated.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为on时,将模拟对ISAPI回调的异步支持。

trans-unit.source: While that should do the trick for most, they are people who might prefer a statically linked nghttp2 in this module. For those, the option --enable-nghttp2-staticlib-deps exists. It works quite similar to how one statically links openssl to mod_ssl.
trans-unit.target: 尽管这对于大多数人来说应该可以解决问题，但有些人可能更喜欢此模块中的静态链接 nghttp2 。对于这些选项，存在 --enable-nghttp2-staticlib-deps 选项。它的工作原理与将 mod_ssl 静态链接到mod_ssl的方式非常相似。

trans-unit.source: While the Apache httpd project does not currently create binary RPMs for the various distributions out there, it is easy to build your own binary RPMs from the canonical Apache httpd tarball.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Apache httpd项目目前并没有为不同的发行版创建二进制RPM,但从标准的Apache httpd tar包中创建自己的二进制RPM还是很容易的。

trans-unit.source: While the parent process is usually started as root under Unix in order to bind to port 80, the child processes and threads are launched by the server as a less-privileged user. The User and Group directives are used to set the privileges of the Apache HTTP Server child processes. The child processes must be able to read all the content that will be served, but should have as few privileges beyond that as possible. In addition, unless suexec is used, these directives also set the privileges which will be inherited by CGI scripts.
trans-unit.target: 为了绑定到端口80，父进程通常在Unix下以 root 身份启动，而子进程和线程则由服务器以特权较低的用户身份启动。在 User 和 Group 指令用于设置Apache HTTP服务器的子进程的权限。子进程必须能够读取将要提供的所有内容，但应具有尽可能少的特权。另外，除非使用 suexec ，否则这些指令还将设置CGI脚本将继承的特权。

trans-unit.source: While the parent process is usually started as root under Unix in order to bind to port 80, the child processes are launched by Apache httpd as a less-privileged user. The User and Group directives are used to set the privileges of the Apache httpd child processes. The child processes must be able to read all the content that will be served, but should have as few privileges beyond that as possible.
trans-unit.target: 虽然父进程通常是在Unix下以 root 身份启动，以便绑定到端口80，但是子进程由Apache httpd作为特权较低的用户启动。在 User 和 Group 指令用于设置Apache的httpd的子进程的权限。子进程必须能够读取将要提供的所有内容，但应具有尽可能少的特权。

trans-unit.source: While this directive is supported in virtual host context, the changes it makes are visible to any later configuration directives, beyond any enclosing virtual host.
trans-unit.target: 虽然该指令在虚拟主机上下文中得到支持,但它所做的更改对任何后来的配置指令都是可见的,超越了任何包围的虚拟主机。

trans-unit.source: While this directive may be specified in any virtual host, it is important to understand that because the PROXY protocol is connection based and protocol agnostic, the enabling and disabling is actually based on IP address and port. This means that if you have multiple name-based virtual hosts for the same host and port, and you enable it for any one of them, then it is enabled for all of them (with that host and port). It also means that if you attempt to enable the PROXY protocol in one and disable in the other, that won't work; in such a case, the last one wins and a notice will be logged indicating which setting was being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这个指令可以在任何虚拟主机中指定,但要明白的是,由于PROXY协议是基于连接的,协议不可知,所以启用和禁用实际上是基于IP地址和端口的。这意味着,如果你有多个基于名称的虚拟主机,对于同一个主机和端口,你为其中任何一个虚拟主机启用,那么它就会为所有的虚拟主机(与该主机和端口)启用。这也意味着,如果你试图在一个主机中启用PROXY协议,而在另一个主机中禁用PROXY协议,那将无法工作;在这种情况下,最后一个主机获胜,并将记录一个通知,说明哪个设置被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: While this is great for performance, it comes at a price: such vhosts need more care in their configuration. The problem is that you will have multiple requests for multiple hosts on the same TLS connection. And that makes renegotiation impossible, in face the HTTP/2 standard forbids it.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这对性能来说很好,但它也是有代价的:这样的vhosts需要在配置上更加小心。问题是,你会在同一个TLS连接上有多个主机的多个请求。而这使得重新协商成为不可能,面对HTTP/2标准是禁止的。

trans-unit.source: While this mode offers the best performance, the administrator may find that under certain circumstances they may want to perform further processing on the request after the request is cached, such as to inject personalisation into the cached page, or to apply authorisation restrictions to the content. Under these circumstances, an administrator is often forced to place independent reverse proxy servers either behind or in front of the caching server to achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这种模式提供了最好的性能,但管理员可能会发现,在某些情况下,他们可能希望在请求被缓存后对请求进行进一步的处理,例如在缓存页面中注入个性化,或对内容施加授权限制。在这种情况下,管理员往往不得不在缓存服务器的后面或前面放置独立的反向代理服务器来实现这一目的。

trans-unit.source: While with the following configuration you specify a preference for specific speed-optimized ciphers (which will be selected by mod_ssl, provided that they are supported by the client):
trans-unit.target: 而在下面的配置中,您可以指定特定的速度优化的密码(只要客户端支持,mod_ssl就会选择这些密码)。

trans-unit.source: Why do I get a file listing when I expected a file to be downloaded?
trans-unit.target: 为什么我期望下载的文件,却得到一个文件列表?

trans-unit.source: Why do I get handshake failures with Java-based clients when using a certificate with more than 1024 bits?
trans-unit.target: 为什么当我使用超过1024位的证书时,基于Java的客户端会出现握手失败?

trans-unit.source: Why do I get lots of random SSL protocol errors under heavy server load?
trans-unit.target: 为什么在服务器重载的情况下会出现很多随机的SSL协议错误?

trans-unit.source: Why do I get permission errors related to SSLMutex when I start Apache?
trans-unit.target: 当我启动Apache时,为什么会出现与SSLMutex相关的权限错误?

trans-unit.source: Why do browsers complain that they cannot verify my server certificate?
trans-unit.target: 为什么浏览器抱怨无法验证我的服务器证书?

trans-unit.source: Why does mod_ssl stop with the error "Failed to generate temporary 512 bit RSA private key" when I start Apache?
trans-unit.target: 为什么当我启动Apache时,mod_ssl会以 "Failed to generate temporary 512 bit RSA private key "的错误停止?

trans-unit.source: Why does my webserver have a higher load, now that it serves SSL encrypted traffic?
trans-unit.target: 为什么我的Web服务器的负载较高,现在它服务于SSL加密的流量?

trans-unit.source: Why does the connection hang when I connect to my SSL-aware Apache server?
trans-unit.target: 为什么当我连接到我的SSL感知的Apache服务器时,连接挂起?

trans-unit.source: Why doesn't file type <var>xxx</var> download via FTP?
trans-unit.target: 为什么文件类型 <var>xxx</var> 不能通过FTP下载？

trans-unit.source: Wiki
trans-unit.target: Wiki

trans-unit.source: Wildcard matching is supported for specific cases: an subjectAltName entry of type dNSName, or CN attributes starting with *. will match with any host name of the same number of name elements and the same suffix. E.g. *.example.org will match foo.example.org, but will not match foo.bar.example.org, because the number of elements in the respective host names differs.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下支持通配符匹配：dNSName类型的subjectAltName条目，或以 *. 开头的CN属性。将与具有相同数量的名称元素和相同后缀的任何主机名匹配。例如 *.example.org 将匹配 foo.example.org ，但是将不匹配 foo.bar.example.org ，因为各个主机名中的元素数量不同。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards and Regular Expressions
trans-unit.target: 通配符和正则表达式

trans-unit.source: Wildcards may be included in the directory or file portion of the path. This example will fail if there is no subdirectory in conf/vhosts that contains at least one *.conf file:
trans-unit.target: 通配符可以包含在路径的目录或文件部分。如果conf/vhosts中没有包含至少一个*.conf文件的子目录,这个例子将失败。

trans-unit.source: Will behave as documented, although the fKeepConn flag is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 尽管会忽略 fKeepConn 标志，但其行为将与文档中所述相同。

trans-unit.source: Will contain the scheme of the request (usually "http" or "https"). This value can be influenced with ServerName.
trans-unit.target: 将包含请求的方案（通常为“ http”或“ https”）。可以使用 ServerName 来影响此值。

trans-unit.source: Will contain the text "on" if the connection is using SSL/TLS, or "off" otherwise. (This variable can be safely used regardless of whether or not mod_ssl is loaded).
trans-unit.target: 如果连接使用的是SSL / TLS，则将包含文本“ on”，否则将包含“ off”。（无论是否加载了 mod_ssl ，都可以安全地使用此变量）。

trans-unit.source: Will contain the text "true" if the request currently being processed is a sub-request, "false" otherwise. Sub-requests may be generated by modules that need to resolve additional files or URIs in order to complete their tasks.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在处理的请求是一个子请求,将包含文本 "true",否则为 "false"。子请求可能由需要解析额外文件或URI的模块生成,以完成其任务。

trans-unit.source: Will dump the full data passing through to a tempfile before the provider. For single-user debug only; this will not support concurrent hits.
trans-unit.target: 将转储提供者之前传递到临时文件的完整数据。仅用于单用户调试；这将不支持并发命中。

trans-unit.source: Will report false if the request has been aborted.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求被取消,将报假。

trans-unit.source: Will return the negotiated Keep-Alive status.
trans-unit.target: 将返回协商好的Keep-Alive状态。

trans-unit.source: Win32 only
trans-unit.target: 仅限Win32

trans-unit.source: Win32 only.
trans-unit.target: 仅限Win32。

trans-unit.source: Window's mpm_winnt interprets the AcceptFilter to toggle the AcceptEx() API, and does not support http protocol buffering. connect will use the AcceptEx() API, also retrieve the network endpoint addresses, but like none the connect option does not wait for the initial data transmission.
trans-unit.target: Window的mpm_winnt解释AcceptFilter以切换AcceptEx（）API，并且不支持http协议缓冲。 connect 将使用AcceptEx（）API，还检索网络端点地址，但是像 none connect 一样，connect选项不会等待初始数据传输。

trans-unit.source: Windows
trans-unit.target: Windows

trans-unit.source: Windows & Netware only. Insecure.
trans-unit.target: 仅Windows和Netware。不安全

trans-unit.source: Windows Tuning
trans-unit.target: 窗口调整

trans-unit.source: Windows example
trans-unit.target: 窗口示例

trans-unit.source: With event, increase this directive if the process number defined by your MaxRequestWorkers and ThreadsPerChild settings, plus the number of gracefully shutting down processes, is more than 16 server processes (default).
trans-unit.target: 使用 event ，如果由 MaxRequestWorkers 和 ThreadsPerChild 设置定义的进程号加上正常关闭的进程数大于16个服务器进程（默认值），请增加此指令。

trans-unit.source: With worker, use this directive only if your MaxRequestWorkers and ThreadsPerChild settings require more than 16 server processes (default). Do not set the value of this directive any higher than the number of server processes required by what you may want for MaxRequestWorkers and ThreadsPerChild.
trans-unit.target: 使用 worker 时，仅当您的 MaxRequestWorkers 和 ThreadsPerChild 设置需要超过16个服务器进程（默认）时，才使用此伪指令。请勿将此指令的值设置为高于您可能对 MaxRequestWorkers 和 ThreadsPerChild 所需的服务器进程数。

trans-unit.source: With MDPortMap you can tell it which 'Internet port' corresponds to which local port.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MDPortMap ,您可以告诉它哪个“ Internet端口”对应于哪个本地端口。

trans-unit.source: With ProtocolsHonorOrder set to on (default), the client ordering does not matter and only the ordering in the server settings influences the outcome of the protocol negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 在 ProtocolsHonorOrder 设置为 on （默认）的情况下，客户端顺序无关紧要，只有服务器设置中的顺序会影响协议协商的结果。

trans-unit.source: With UseCanonicalName Off Apache httpd will form self-referential URLs using the hostname and port supplied by the client if any are supplied (otherwise it will use the canonical name, as defined above). These values are the same that are used to implement name-based virtual hosts and are available with the same clients. The CGI variables SERVER_NAME and SERVER_PORT will be constructed from the client supplied values as well.
trans-unit.target: 与 UseCanonicalName Off 的Apache的httpd将形成使用由如果使用了任何客户端提供的主机名和端口自引用的URL（否则它将使用的规范名称，如上面所定义）。这些值与用于实现基于名称的虚拟主机的值相同，并且可用于相同的客户端。CGI变量 SERVER_NAME 和 SERVER_PORT 也将由客户端提供的值构造。

trans-unit.source: With UseCanonicalPhysicalPort Off, the physical ports are removed from the ordering.
trans-unit.target: 随着 UseCanonicalPhysicalPort Off ，物理端口从排序中删除。

trans-unit.source: With Apache's ability to set environment variables with the SetEnvIf directives, and other related directives, this functionality can let you do a wide variety of dynamic content on the server side without resorting a full web application.
trans-unit.target: Apache具有通过 SetEnvIf 指令和其他相关指令设置环境变量的功能，该功能可以让您在服务器端执行多种动态内容，而无需使用完整的Web应用程序。

trans-unit.source: With Pw specified as 512, a pushed, interleaved stream would get double the weight of X. With 128 only half as much. Note that effective weights are always capped at 256.
trans-unit.target: 当Pw指定为512时,一个推送的交错流将获得X的双倍重量,而128时只有一半。请注意,有效权重总是以256为上限。

trans-unit.source: With a network-mounted DocumentRoot (e.g., NFS, SMB, CIFS, FUSE), the kernel may be unable to serve the network file through its own cache.
trans-unit.target: 使用网络安装的 DocumentRoot （例如NFS，SMB，CIFS，FUSE），内核可能无法通过其自己的缓存为网络文件提供服务。

trans-unit.source: With a request for http://www.example.com/~bob/one/two.html, will try to find the page at ~bob/public_html/one/two.html first, then /usr/web/bob/one/two.html, and finally it will send a redirect to http://www.example.com/bob/one/two.html.
trans-unit.target: 在请求 http://www.example.com/~bob/one/two.html 的情况下，它将首先尝试在 ~bob/public_html/one/two.html 上找到该页面，然后在 /usr/web/bob/one/two.html ，最后它将重定向发送到 http://www.example.com/bob/one/two.html 。

trans-unit.source: With an NFS-mounted filesystem, the kernel may be unable to reliably serve the network file through its own cache.
trans-unit.target: 在NFS挂载的文件系统中,内核可能无法通过自己的缓存可靠地服务于网络文件。

trans-unit.source: With more complicated setups, you can use httpd's normal <VirtualHost> directives to control the scope of the various virtual hosting configurations. For example, you could have one IP address for general customers' homepages, and another for commercial customers, with the following setup. This can be combined with conventional <VirtualHost> configuration sections, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 通过更复杂的设置，您可以使用httpd的常规 <VirtualHost> 指令来控制各种虚拟主机配置的范围。例如，通过以下设置，您可以为普通客户的主页提供一个IP地址，为商业客户提供一个IP地址。可以将其与常规的 <VirtualHost> 配置节结合使用，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: With name-based virtual hosting, the server relies on the client to report the hostname as part of the HTTP headers. Using this technique, many different hosts can share the same IP address.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于名称的虚拟主机,服务器依靠客户端报告主机名作为HTTP头的一部分。使用这种技术,许多不同的主机可以共享同一个IP地址。

trans-unit.source: With the prefork MPM, use this directive only if you need to set MaxRequestWorkers higher than 256 (default). Do not set the value of this directive any higher than what you might want to set MaxRequestWorkers to.
trans-unit.target: 对于 prefork MPM，仅当需要将 MaxRequestWorkers 设置为大于256（默认值）时，才使用此伪指令。请勿将此指令的值设置得比您要设置 MaxRequestWorkers 的值高。

trans-unit.source: With the B flag set on this same rule, the parameters are re-encoded before being passed on to the output URL, resulting in a correct mapping to /search.php?term=x%20%26%20y%2Fz.
trans-unit.target: 在此规则上设置B标志后，参数将在传递到输出URL之前重新编码，从而正确映射到 /search.php?term=x%20%26%20y%2Fz 。

trans-unit.source: With the [E], or [env] flag, you can set the value of an environment variable. Note that some environment variables may be set after the rule is run, thus unsetting what you have set. See the Environment Variables document for more details on how Environment variables work.
trans-unit.target: 使用[E]或[env]标志，可以设置环境变量的值。请注意，在运行规则后可能会设置一些环境变量，从而取消设置的内容。有关环境变量如何工作的更多详细信息，请参见环境变量文档。

trans-unit.source: With the [QSA] flag, a request for /pages/123?one=two will be mapped to /page.php?page=123&one=two. Without the [QSA] flag, that same request will be mapped to /page.php?page=123 - that is, the existing query string will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 使用[QSA]标志，对 /pages/123?one=two 的请求将映射到 /page.php?page=123&one=two 。如果没有[QSA]标志，该请求将被映射到 /page.php?page=123 -也就是说，现有查询字符串将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: With the default value, Off, such URLs are refused with a 404 (Not found) error.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认值 Off 时，将拒绝此类URL，并显示404（未找到）错误。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of some built-in comparison operators, binary operators have the form "-[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]+", i.e. a minus and at least two characters. The name is not case sensitive. Modules may register additional binary operators.
trans-unit.target: 除某些内置比较运算符外，二进制运算符的格式为“ -[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]+ ”，即减号和至少两个字符。名称不区分大小写。模块可以注册其他二进制运算符。

trans-unit.source: With the file-based mechanisms fcntl and flock, the path, if provided, is a directory where the lock file will be created. The default directory is httpd's run-time file directory relative to ServerRoot. Always use a local disk filesystem for /path/to/mutex and never a directory residing on a NFS- or AFS-filesystem. The basename of the file will be the mutex type, an optional instance string provided by the module, and unless the OmitPID keyword is specified, the process id of the httpd parent process will be appended to make the file name unique, avoiding conflicts when multiple httpd instances share a lock file directory. For example, if the mutex name is mpm-accept and the lock file directory is /var/httpd/locks, the lock file name for the httpd instance with parent process id 12345 would be /var/httpd/locks/mpm-accept.12345.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于文件的机制fcntl和flock，该路径（如果提供）是将在其中创建锁定文件的目录。默认目录是httpd的相对于 ServerRoot 的运行时文件目录。始终对 /path/to/mutex 使用本地磁盘文件系统，而不要对位于NFS或AFS文件系统上的目录使用。文件的基本名称将是互斥体类型，即模块提供的可选实例字符串，除非指定了 OmitPID 关键字，否则将附加httpd父进程的进程ID以使文件名唯一，从而避免了多个文件名冲突的情况。 httpd实例共享一个锁定文件目录。例如，如果互斥锁名称为 mpm-accept 并且锁文件目录为 /var/httpd/locks ，父进程ID为12345的httpd实例的锁文件名称为 /var/httpd/locks/mpm-accept.12345 。

trans-unit.source: With the introduction of SSLCARevocationFile, the behavior has been changed: by default with chain or leaf, CRLs must be present for the validation to succeed - otherwise it will fail with an "unable to get certificate CRL" error.
trans-unit.target: 随着 SSLCARevocationFile 的引入，行为已更改：默认情况下，使用 chain 或 leaf 时，必须存在CRL 才能使验证成功-否则它将失败，并显示 "unable to get certificate CRL" 错误。

trans-unit.source: With the introduction of authorization container directives such as <RequireAll> and <RequireAny>, the configuration also has control over when the authorization methods are called and what criteria determines when access is granted. See Authorization Containers for an example of how they may be used to express complex authorization logic.
trans-unit.target: 通过引入授权容器指令（例如 <RequireAll> 和 <RequireAny> )，该配置还可以控制何时调用授权方法以及由什么条件确定何时授予访问权限。有关如何使用它们表示复杂的授权逻辑的示例，请参见授权容器。

trans-unit.source: With the introduction of the new provider based authentication and authorization architecture, you are no longer locked into a single authentication or authorization method. In fact any number of the providers can be mixed and matched to provide you with exactly the scheme that meets your needs. In the following example, both the file and LDAP based authentication providers are being used.
trans-unit.target: 随着新的基于提供商的认证和授权架构的引入,您不再被锁定在单一的认证或授权方法上。事实上,任何数量的提供者都可以混合和匹配,为您提供符合您需求的方案。在下面的例子中,同时使用了基于文件和LDAP的认证提供者。
